MultiFeature.Name: Celerity
MultiFeature.Text: You channel psionic power into your body, honing your reflexes and agility to an incredible degree. The world seems to slow down while you continue to move as normal.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Psychic Focus
Feature.Text: While focused on this discipline, your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Rapid Step (1–7 psi)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you increase your walking speed by 10 feet per psi point spent until the end of the current turn. If you have a climbing or swimming speed, this increase applies to that speed as well.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Agile Defense (2 psi)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you take the Dodge action.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Blur of Motion (2 psi)
Feature.Text: As an action, you cause yourself to be invisible during any of your movement during the current turn.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Surge of Speed (2 psi)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you gain two benefits until the end of the current turn: you don’t provoke opportunity attacks, and you have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

Feature.Name: Celerity - Surge of Action (5 psi)
Feature.Text: As a bonus action, you can Dash or make one weapon attack.
